") //菱形 for (let i = 1; i <= 3; i++) { document.write("  ".repeat(3 - i) + " *".repeat(i * 2 - 1) + "
"); } for (let i = 2; i >= 1; i--) { document.write("  ".repeat(3 - i) + " *".repeat(i * 2 - 1) + "
"); }

entry.content: /* 页脚与头图透明 */#footer { background: transparent !important;}#page-header { background: transparent !important;}/* 白天模式遮罩透明 */#footer::before { background: transparent !important;}#page-header::before { background: transparent !important;}/* 夜间模式遮罩透明 */[data-theme="dark"] #footer::before { background: transparent !important;}[data-theme="dark"] #page-header::before { background: transparent !important;}
